title: Boolean logic with two dimensional array elements

content.description: A two-dimensional array arr is to be created with the following contents.
content.question: boolean[][] arr = {{false, true, false},{false, false, true}};Which of the following code segments can be used to correctly create and initialize arr ?

choices.label: boolean arr[][] = new boolean[2][3];arr[0][1] = true;arr[1][2] = true;
boolean arr[][] = new boolean[2][3];arr[1][2] = true;arr[2][3] = true;
boolean arr[][] = new boolean[3][2];arr[0][1] = true;arr[1][2] = true;
boolean arr[][] = new boolean[3][2];arr[1][0] = true;arr[2][1] = true;

content.answer: boolean arr[][] = new boolean[2][3];arr[0][1] = true;arr[1][2] = true;

skill.text: 2.B: Write program code involving data abstractions.
